summary: This document is an email chain from July 2, 2020, discussing the signing of an unsealing order and a request for information about the date of a photograph, likely of Ghislaine Maxwell, to prepare for potential press inquiries. The chain references a New York Times article from 2019.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of photograph and press inquiry
persons.context: The email chain is about preparing information for the press regarding a photograph of her, which the New York Times reported was taken in 2005.

events.title: Photograph of Ghislaine Maxwell taken
events.description: A photograph of Ghislaine Maxwell, referenced in a 2019 New York Times article, was reportedly taken in 2005.

events.title: New York Times publishes article with Maxwell photo
events.description: The New York Times ran an article about Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, which included the photograph from 2005.

events.title: Unsealing order signed and press advisory prepared
events.description: An unsealing order is signed, prompting an email chain about sending a press advisory and preparing information about a photograph of Ghislaine Maxwell in case of media inquiries.

keyFacts: An unsealing order was signed on July 2, 2020, prompting immediate action to send a press advisory.
A photograph of Ghislaine Maxwell, central to press inquiries, was reported by the New York Times to have been taken in 2005.
The email chain shows coordination to manage public and press information following a legal development in the case.
